attributes.action: Remove Unelected Tory MEP, Anthea McIntyre.
attributes.additional_details:
Sir,

We ask that you remove the recently 'appointed' Tory Anthea McIntyre as a UK Member of the European Parliament and hold a democratic election in order for the voters to appoint their chosen MEP.

This appointment (and the person who accepted it) is a complete disgrace, a mockery of our electoral system and certainly further proof that the UK government is just a smokescreen for the corrupt and increasingly totalitarian European Union that governs this country by stealth.
